description: A quick, practical guide to The Long Road Ahead.

hook.text: We've built AI that talks, sees, creates, and discovers. We've barely scratched the surface of what's possible.

buildup.text: Current AI lacks common sense, true understanding, robust reasoning, and ethical judgment.

discovery.text: Every breakthrough reveals ten new problems. Progress creates complexity faster than it solves it.

climax.text: AI's future depends not on what machines can do, but on what humans choose to do with them.
